author: zhaobenny
description: Human-like Discord interactions powered by OpenAI (+ other LLMs) for messages (and images)
install_msg:
See cog README for additional setup. 
Quick startup guide for OpenAI: 
1. Set (preferably paid) OpenAI key using [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY 
2. [p]aiuser add <#CHANNEL_NAME> 
3. [p]aiuser optin to opt yourself into getting messages used (other users will need to do the same)
short: Human-like user behavior powered by LLMs.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not autonomously store data or metadata concerning users. With user consent, chat messages/images may be forwarded to OpenAI or third parties to produce responses. For further details, please consult: https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy, https://openrouter.ai/privacy, https://stablehorde.net/privacy, and relevant third-party privacy policies.
